name: note
description: Educational Open Source Project to practice with `JavaScript, TypeScript, Node, oclif, Git, Web Components, and Project Management`

scripts.generate:codelabs: (cd docs/workshop/site/workshop/codelabs; for smth in $(ls *.md); do (claat export $smth); done)
scripts.publish:site: git subtree push --prefix docs/workshop/site korzio.github.io master
